basics.label: Frontend Developer & ICT Assistant Advisor
basics.summary: I'm a web developer and ICT enthusiast from Bangladesh, with over 1.5 years of experience in frontend development. I've worked with companies in Bangladesh and contributed to national ICT initiatives. My passion lies in building responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, and TypeScript. I'm also active in tech education and political awareness through YouTube and blogging.
